faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to help you understand our service

q1.question: How do I use AI Pet Live?
q1.answer: Simply upload a clear photo of your pet, choose between image or video mode, select a style (like baby, police, or cartoon), optionally add a text description, and click Generate. Your AI creation will be ready in seconds!

q2.question: What types of pets work best?
q2.answer: AI Pet Live works best with dogs and cats, but can also create amazing results for rabbits, birds, hamsters, and other pets. Just make sure the photo shows your pet's face clearly.

q3.question: How long does generation take?
q3.answer: Images typically generate in 5-10 seconds, while videos take 30-60 seconds depending on the duration you choose (3-10 seconds).

q4.question: Can I use the generated content commercially?
q4.answer: Yes! All content you create is yours to use however you like, including for commercial purposes and social media.
